meanings.definition: A car attached to the end of a train, used by the crew as a kitchen or living quarters.
meanings.sent1: The caboose at the back of the train was where the crew cooked their meals.
meanings.sent2: The caboose was a cozy place for the train crew to relax after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The chef in the caboose accidentally dropped a pot of soup on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The caboose, like a tiny house on wheels, followed the train faithfully.
meanings.sent5: The red caboose stood out at the end of the long train, a symbol of comfort for the crew.
